attributes.action: GIVE US THE BRITISH PEOPLE A VOTE ON ANY FURTHER EU INVOLVEMENT
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We already suffer from silly decisions made by overpaid European Ministers who care about nothing but their own egos.
We want to remain British and run our own affairs.
We want less of Europe not more.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
